snippet: The 16-year-olds, who live in a Boys Town residence in Brooklyn, were charged with raping and robbing a woman they encountered at an Internet cafe, the police said.
abstract: Teenagers Eric Pek, Emanuel Burrows and Sanat Asliev are arrested and charged as adults for assault, rape and robbery of woman in Manhattan's Chinatown neighborhood; police track boys, who were caught by surveillance cameras at all-night deli and in woman's apartment building, to residence in Brooklyn run by Boys Town organization.
lead_paragraph: The 16-year-olds, who live in a Boys Town residence in Brooklyn, were charged with raping and robbing a woman they encountered at an Internet cafe, the police said.

headline.main: 3 Teenagers Are Arrested in Rape in Chinatown
headline.print_headline: Rape and Robbery Follow a Chinatown Encounter; 3 Teenagers Are Arrested
